original_text: All the neighbors were filled with awe, and throughout the hill country of Judea people were talking about all these things.
korean_text: 그 근처에 사는 자가 다 두려워하고 이 모든 말이 온 유대 산골에 두루 퍼지매

sentences.original_text: All the neighbors were filled with awe
and throughout the hill country of Judea
people were talking about all these things
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 이 모든 일에 대해 이야기하고 있었다
